document_data.name: ''My Love Was a Lass from Shadowdale''
document_data.location: [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], [[Sea of Swords]], [[Shining Sea]]
document_data.History: Even thought the shanty originated in the Sea of Fallen Stars, it moved to the [[Sword Coast]], [[Sea of Swords]], and the [[Shining Sea]] along with the crew of Captain [[Bawr]]'s ''[[Narwhal (galleon)|Narwhal]]''. In [[1362 DR]], [[Artus Cimber]] and [[Hydel Pontifax]] heard the shanty onboard Bawr's [[galleon]] on their way from [[Baldur's Gate]] to [[Chult]].
